Symbol.Script_3D:
! Contact person: <BD, BO, NJ>
! =============================================================================
lod3D = 0 ! Don't draw anything if (GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 9 & GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE = 0) then ! in case of Surface IS Calculation lod3D = 2 ! Detailed else if iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_SIMPLE then lod3D = 1 ! Simple if iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_DETAILED then lod3D = 2 ! Detailed if iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_SIMPLE | iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_DETAILED then if (GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 | GLOB_CONTEXT = 24 | GLOB_CONTEXT = 6) then lod3D = 5 ! Chinese else lod3D = 2 endif endif endif
gs_fillFr = gs_bFills * gs_fillFr gs_penFr_fg = gs_bFills * gs_penFr_fg gs_penFr_bg = gs_bFills * gs_penFr_bg
gs_fillSash = gs_bFills * gs_fillSash gs_penSash_fg = gs_bFills * gs_penSash_fg gs_penSash_bg = gs_bFills * gs_penSash_bg
if not(gs_shadow) then shadow off
! ============================================================================= ! GS Window Functions ! =============================================================================
call "GS Window Functions", parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, openingArchHeight = openingArchHeight, smallRadiusEllips = gs_smallerRad, nArchResolution = gs_res, gs_IsCurved = gs_IsCurved, bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, lod3D = lod3D, bDisabeMirroring = bDisabeMirroring, gs_frame_width = gs_frame2_width, gs_frame_width_left = gs_frame2_width, returned_parameters ac_unit_width, ac_unit_height, gs_frame_ovhg_left_out, gs_frame_ovhg_right_out, gs_frame_ovhg_top_out, gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out, gs_frame_ovhg_left_in, gs_frame_ovhg_right_in, gs_frame_ovhg_top_in, gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in, bMirrored, xform11, xform12, xform13, xform14, xform21, xform22, xform23, xform24, xform31, xform32, xform33, xform34,
bOplines3d, opLineType3dIn, opLineType3dOut, gs_opline_style_m, gs_opLinePen, bShowAddHotspots, bShowAddHotspotsForIS, bShowUnitHotspots
! ============================================================================= ! Block for operator mode ! =============================================================================
if GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 & GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 then prism_ 4, WIDO_FRAME_THICKNESS, -ac_unit_width/2, 0, 15, ac_unit_width/2, 0, 15, ac_unit_width/2, ac_unit_height, 15, -ac_unit_width/2, ac_unit_height, 15
end endif
if lod3D = 0 then end
xform xform11, xform12, xform13, xform14, xform21, xform22, xform23, xform24, xform31, xform32, xform33, xform34
muly -1 addy WIDO_FRAME_THICKNESS
temp = gs_frame_ovhg_left_out gs_frame_ovhg_left_out = gs_frame_ovhg_left_in gs_frame_ovhg_left_in = temp
temp = gs_frame_ovhg_right_out gs_frame_ovhg_right_out = gs_frame_ovhg_right_in gs_frame_ovhg_right_in = temp
temp = gs_frame_ovhg_top_in gs_frame_ovhg_top_in = gs_frame_ovhg_top_out gs_frame_ovhg_top_out = temp
temp = gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in = gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out = temp
if lod3D = 5 then ! Chinese fr_sect_fill_type = gs_fillShCover fr_sect_fill_fg = gs_penShCov_fg fr_sect_fill_bg = gs_penShCov_bg else fr_sect_fill_type = gs_fillFr fr_sect_fill_fg = gs_penFr_fg fr_sect_fill_bg = gs_penFr_bg endif
A = ac_unit_width B = ac_unit_height
leftOvhg = max(gs_frame_ovhg_left_out, gs_frame_ovhg_left_in) rightOvhg = leftOvhg topOvhg = leftOvhg bottomOvhg = max(gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out, gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in)
gs_shoulderHeight = gs_shoulderHeight - bottomOvhg
if abs(WIDO_ORIG_DIST) > eps then varOvhg = leftOvhg if abs(gs_tolerance_left) > eps then varOvhg = leftOvhg - gs_tolerance_left endif else varOvhg = 0 endif
! ============================================================================= ! Draw window frame and sash ! =============================================================================
rotx 90 resol gs_res
! ============================================================================= ! Draw Frame ! =============================================================================
if gs_frame_pen_cont < 0.5 then gs_frame_pen_cont = SYMB_SECT_PEN if gs_fillFr < 0.5 then gs_fillFr = SYMB_FILL if gs_penFr_bg < 0.5 then gs_penFr_bg = SYMB_FBGD_PEN if gs_penFr_fg < 0.5 then gs_penFr_fg = SYMB_FILL_PEN
pen gs_frame_pen_cont material gs_frame_mat sect_fill gs_fillFr, gs_penFr_bg, gs_penFr_fg, gs_frame_pen_cont
pen gs_frame_pen ! 3D Contour Pen halfA = A / 2
cutLeft = 0 cutRight = 0 cutBottom = 0 cutTop = 0 if abs(gs_frame_ovhg_left_out - gs_frame_ovhg_left_in) > EPS then addx -halfA - gs_frame_ovhg_left_out rotz 90 cutplane -90 + atn((gs_frame_ovhg_left_out - gs_frame_ovhg_left_in) / gs_frame_thk)
del 2 cutLeft = 1 endif
if abs(gs_frame_ovhg_right_out - gs_frame_ovhg_right_in) > EPS then addx halfA + gs_frame_ovhg_right_out rotz 90 cutplane 90 - atn((gs_frame_ovhg_right_out - gs_frame_ovhg_right_in) / gs_frame_thk) del 2 cutRight = 1 endif
curvedWall = (abs(WIDO_ORIG_DIST) > EPS) if abs(gs_frame_ovhg_top_out - gs_frame_ovhg_top_in) > EPS | curvedWall then addy B + gs_frame_ovhg_top_out rotz 90 roty -90 - atn((gs_frame_ovhg_top_out - gs_frame_ovhg_top_in) / gs_frame_thk) cutplane 180 del 3 cutTop = 1 endif
if abs(gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out - gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in) > EPS then addy -gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out rotz 90 roty 90 + atn((gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out - gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in) / gs_frame_thk) cutplane 180 del 3 cutBottom = 1 endif
! ============================================================================= ! End of Frame Cutting
pen gs_frame_pen
! hotspot editing for the divisions
unID=1 if gs_UTrans then hotspot 0, 0, 0, unID,gs_UTrans_h,1 : unID=unID+1 hotspot 0, gs_UTrans_h,0, unID,gs_UTrans_h,2 : unID=unID+1 hotspot 0, -B, 0, unID,gs_UTrans_h,3 : unID=unID+1 endif
hotspot ac_wallhole_width/2, 0, 0, unID,gs_shoulderHeight,1 : unID=unID+1 hotspot ac_wallhole_width/2, gs_shoulderHeight, 0, unID,gs_shoulderHeight,2 : unID=unID+1 hotspot ac_wallhole_width/2, -B, 0, unID,gs_shoulderHeight,3 : unID=unID+1
hotspot -ac_wallhole_width/2, 0, 0, unID,gs_shoulderHeight,1 : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ac_wallhole_width/2, gs_shoulderHeight, 0, unID,gs_shoulderHeight,2 : unID=unID+1 hotspot -ac_wallhole_width/2, -B, 0, unID,gs_shoulderHeight,3 : unID=unID+1
numCutend = 0
! Frame Modell ---------------------------------------------------
additionSimplex = 0 additionSimpley = 0 if lod3D = 1 then additionSimplex = gs_sash_thk - gs_rebate_depth additionSimpley = gs_sash_width - gs_rebate_width endif
for iSide = 1 to 2 if iSide = 1 then inSide = 0 outSide = 1 else inSide = 1 outSide = 0 endif
if outSide then heightz = gs_frame2_thk framex = gs_frame2_width + additionSimpley bottom_framex = gs_frame2_width_lower + additionSimpley framey = gs_frame2_thk varMat = gs_frame_mat else heightz = gs_frame_thk - gs_frame2_thk framex = gs_frame_width + additionSimpley bottom_framex = gs_frame_width_lower + additionSimpley framey = gs_frame_thk varMat = gs_frame_mat2 endif
! Rebate cutting from the frame ---------------------------------------------------[ if lod3D = 1 then mulz 1
! Always has Transom but no Transom Sash sashSy = bottom_framex sashEy = gs_UTrans_h - gs_UTrans_w/2 - (gs_rebate_width * outSide)
if (gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_FIXED) then cutform 4, 1, 1+2, 0, 0, 1, heightz, -halfA + framex - gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + framex - gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16 numCutend = numCutend + 1 endif
if (gs_optype_m_01 = SASH_FIXED) then cutform 4, 1, 1+2, 0, 0, 1, heightz, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16 numCutend = numCutend + 1 endif
if (gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_FIXED) then cutform 4, 1, 1+2, 0, 0, 1, heightz, halfA - framex + gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - framex + gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16 numCutend = numCutend + 1 endif
del 1 endif
if lod3D = 2 then mulz -1 addz -heightz
! Always has Transom but no Transom Sash sashSy = bottom_framex sashEy = gs_UTrans_h - gs_UTrans_w/2 + (gs_rebate_width * inSide)
if (gs_optype_m_09 <> SASH_FIXED) then cutform 4, 1, 1+2, 0, 0, 1, gs_rebate_depth, -halfA + framex - gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w - framex/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w - framex/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + framex - gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16 numCutend = numCutend + 1 endif
if (gs_optype_m_01 <> SASH_FIXED) then cutform 4, 1, 1+2, 0, 0, 1, gs_rebate_depth, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w + framex/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w - framex/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w - framex/2 + gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w + framex/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16 numCutend = numCutend + 1 endif
if (gs_optype_m_05 <> SASH_FIXED) then cutform 4, 1, 1+2, 0, 0, 1, gs_rebate_depth, halfA - framex + gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w + framex/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashSy - gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - gs_SLight_w + framex/2 - gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16, halfA - framex + gs_rebate_width, sashEy + gs_rebate_width, 15+16 numCutend = numCutend + 1 endif
del 2 endif ! Rebate cutting from the frame ---------------------------------------------------]
if gs_SashText_typ_num = MITERED_JOINT then ! Mitered Joint leftx = framex rightx = -framex topy = topOvhg bottomy = -bottomOvhg else ! Butt Joint leftx = -leftOvhg rightx = rightOvhg topy = -framex bottomy = bottom_framex endif
! Bottom base cprism_ gs_frame_mat2,gs_frame_mat,varMat, 4,heightz, -halfA - leftOvhg, -bottomOvhg, 15, -halfA + leftx, bottom_framex, 15, halfA + rightx, bottom_framex, 15, halfA + rightOvhg, -bottomOvhg, 15 - 5*gs_stack_bottom
gosub "Texture Directions Horizontal"
! Left base cprism_ gs_frame_mat2,gs_frame_mat,varMat, 4,heightz, -halfA - leftOvhg, bottomy, 15, -halfA - leftOvhg, gs_shoulderHeight, 15, -halfA + framex, gs_shoulderHeight, 13, -halfA + framex, bottom_framex, 15
gosub "Texture Directions Vertical"
! Top base
smallRadiusEllips_offset = gs_smallerRad + varOvhg middleRadiusEllips_offset = R1 + varOvhg
smallRadiusEllips_in = gs_smallerRad - framex - leftOvhg + varOvhg middleRadiusEllips_in = R1 - framex - topOvhg + varOvhg
cprism_ gs_frame_mat2,gs_frame_mat,varMat, 10, heightz, halfA + leftOvhg, gs_shoulderHeight, 79, 0, B, 800, smallRadiusEllips_offset, alphaSide, 2079, middleRadiusEllips_offset, alphamiddle*2, 2079, smallRadiusEllips_offset, alphaSide, 2079,
-halfA + framex, gs_shoulderHeight, 79, 0, B, 800, smallRadiusEllips_in, -alphaSide, 2079, middleRadiusEllips_in, -alphamiddle*2, 2079, smallRadiusEllips_in, -alphaSide, 2079
gosub "Texture Directions Horizontal"
! Right base cprism_ gs_frame_mat2,gs_frame_mat,varMat, 4,heightz, halfA + rightOvhg, bottomy, 15, halfA + rightOvhg, gs_shoulderHeight, 15, halfA - framex, gs_shoulderHeight, 13, halfA - framex, bottom_framex, 15
gosub "Texture Directions Vertical"
! Transom - Horizontal Division ! Always has Transom but no Transom Sash if inSide & (lod3D = 2) then addz heightz - gs_frame2_thk endif if lod3D = 2 then divx = gs_frame2_thk else divx = heightz endif
divSy = -gs_UTrans_w/2 - additionSimpley + (gs_rebate_width * inSide) divEy = +gs_UTrans_w/2 + additionSimpley - (gs_rebate_width * inSide) base cprism_ gs_frame_mat2,varMat,varMat, 4, divx, -halfA + framex, gs_UTrans_h + divSy, 15, -halfA + framex, gs_UTrans_h + divEy, 15, halfA - framex, gs_UTrans_h + divEy, 15, halfA - framex, gs_UTrans_h + divSy, 15
gosub "Texture Directions Horizontal"
! Vertical Division divSy = bottom_framex divEy = gs_UTrans_h - gs_UTrans_w/2 - additionSimpley + (gs_rebate_width * inSide) base cprism_ gs_frame_mat2,gs_frame_mat,varMat, 4,divx, halfA - gs_SLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2, divSy, 15, halfA - gs_SLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2, divEy, 15, halfA - gs_SLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2, divEy, 15, halfA - gs_SLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2, divSy, 15
gosub "Texture Directions Vertical"
base cprism_ gs_frame_mat2,gs_frame_mat,varMat, 4,divx, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2, divSy, 15, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w + framex/2 + additionSimpley/2, divEy, 15, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2, divEy, 15, -halfA + gs_LeftSLight_w - framex/2 - additionSimpley/2, divSy, 15
gosub "Texture Directions Vertical"
if inSide & (lod3D = 2) then del 1
! --- Inner, Simple ---------------------------------------------- addz gs_frame2_thk
next iSide del iSide-1
for k = 1 to numCutend cutend ! rebate in the frame next k
if cutLeft then cutend if cutRight then cutend if cutTop then cutend if cutBottom then cutend
! ============================================================================= ! Draw Casement ! =============================================================================
if lod3D = 5 then ! Chinese sh_sect_fill_type = gs_fillShCover sh_sect_fill_fg = gs_penShCov_fg sh_sect_fill_bg = gs_penShCov_bg else sh_sect_fill_type = gs_fillSash sh_sect_fill_fg = gs_penSash_fg sh_sect_fill_bg = gs_penSash_bg endif
! ============================================================================= ! Main Sashes ! =============================================================================
! Middle Left Sash ------------------------------------------------------------
sh_unID = 5200 sashWidth = sashWidthArray[2][1] sashHeight = sashHeightArray[2][1] CasementID = CasementIDArray[2][1]
add sashPosXArray[2][1], sashPosYArray[2][1], gs_frame_thk frame_thk = gs_frame_thk - gs_frame2_thk gosub "CallCasement" del 1
sh_unID = 5300 sashWidth = sashWidthArray2[2][1] sashHeight = sashHeightArray2[2][1] CasementID = CasementIDArray[2][1]
add sashPosXArray2[2][1], sashPosYArray2[2][1], gs_frame2_thk frame_thk = gs_frame2_thk gosub "CallCasement" del 1
! Middle Middle Sash ----------------------------------------------------------
sh_unID = 2000 sashWidth = sashWidthArray[2][2] sashHeight = sashHeightArray[2][2] CasementID = CasementIDArray[2][2]
add sashPosXArray[2][2], sashPosYArray[2][2], gs_frame_thk frame_thk = gs_frame_thk - gs_frame2_thk gosub "CallCasement" del 1
sh_unID = 2100 sashWidth = sashWidthArray2[2][2] sashHeight = sashHeightArray2[2][2] CasementID = CasementIDArray[2][2]
add sashPosXArray2[2][2], sashPosYArray2[2][2], gs_frame2_thk frame_thk = gs_frame2_thk gosub "CallCasement" del 1
! Middle Right Sash -----------------------------------------------------------
sh_unID = 3600 sashWidth = sashWidthArray[2][3] sashHeight = sashHeightArray[2][3] CasementID = CasementIDArray[2][3]
add sashPosXArray[2][3], sashPosYArray[2][3], gs_frame_thk frame_thk = gs_frame_thk - gs_frame2_thk gosub "CallCasement" del 1
sh_unID = 3700 sashWidth = sashWidthArray2[2][3] sashHeight = sashHeightArray2[2][3] CasementID = CasementIDArray[2][3]
add sashPosXArray2[2][3], sashPosYArray2[2][3], gs_frame2_thk frame_thk = gs_frame2_thk gosub "CallCasement" del 1
! ============================================================================= ! Transom Sash - Always has ! =============================================================================
mulx -1
hasCustomPanel = (iMullionStyle_02 = MULLION_CUSTOM) & (gs_cust_panel_02 <> "") & (lod3D = 2)
for iSide = 1 to 2
if iSide = 1 then heightz = gs_frame2_thk framex = gs_frame2_width + additionSimpley framey = gs_frame2_thk else heightz = gs_frame_thk - gs_frame2_thk framex = gs_frame_width + additionSimpley framey = gs_frame_thk endif
sashx = A - 2 * framex sashy = B - (framex + gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2)
smallRadiusEllips_offset = gs_smallerRad + varOvhg middleRadiusEllips_offset = R1 + varOvhg
smallRadiusEllips_in = gs_smallerRad - framex - leftOvhg + varOvhg middleRadiusEllips_in = R1 - framex - topOvhg + varOvhg
cutform 7, 1, 1+2+8+16, 0, 0, 1, 1, -halfA + framex, B + topOvhg, 5, -halfA + framex, gs_shoulderHeight, 15+16, 0, B + topOvhg, 815+16, smallRadiusEllips_in, -alphaSide, 2015+16, middleRadiusEllips_in, -alphamiddle*2, 2015+16, smallRadiusEllips_in, -alphaSide, 2015+16, halfA - framex, B + topOvhg, 5
addz framey if lod3D = 2 then if hasCustomPanel then ! Custom Panel addz -gs_sash_thk else addz -gs_rebate_depth - gs_glass_thk/2 endif else addz -heightz/2 - gs_glass_thk/2 endif
! Panes Number Horizontally if lod3D = 2 & iMullionStyle_02 = MULLION_HVGRID then pen gs_sash_pen
if iMullionPosition = MULLION_OUTSIDE then addz -gth if iMullionPosition = MULLION_INSIDE then addz gs_glass_thk if iMullionPosition = MULLION_THROUGHOUT then addz -(gth - gs_glass_thk)/2
gridx = sashx/vgn_02
for iGrid = 1 to vgn_02-1 addx iGrid * gridx - sashx/2
base cprism_ gs_grill_mat2,gs_grill_mat,gs_grill_mat2, 4,gth, -gw/2, gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2 + additionSimpley - gs_rebate_width * (iSide = 2), 15, -gw/2, B - framex, 15, gw/2, B - framex, 15, gw/2, gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2 + additionSimpley - gs_rebate_width * (iSide = 2), 15
gosub "Texture Directions Vertical" del 1 next iGrid
del 1 endif
! Custom Panel if hasCustomPanel then pen gs_glass_pen sect_fill gs_fillSash, gs_penSash_bg, gs_penSash_fg, gs_frame_pen_cont
add framex-a/2, gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2 - gs_rebate_width * (iSide = 2),0
call "Window_Panel_Collection" parameters a = sashx, b = sashy, zzyzx = gs_sash_thk, gs_ptype = gs_cust_panel_02 del 1 else if iMullionStyle_02 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL then pen gs_sash_pen cprism_ gs_panel_mat2,gs_panel_mat,gs_panel_mat, 4,gs_glass_thk, sashx/2, gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2 + additionSimpley - gs_rebate_width * (iSide = 2), 15, sashx/2, B + topOvhg- framex, 15, -sashx/2, B + topOvhg- framex, 15, -sashx/2, gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2 + additionSimpley - gs_rebate_width * (iSide = 2), 15 else pen gs_glass_pen cprism_ gs_glass_mat,gs_glass_mat,gs_glass_mat, 4,gs_glass_thk, sashx/2, gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2 + additionSimpley - gs_rebate_width * (iSide = 2), 5, sashx/2, B + topOvhg- framex, 5, -sashx/2, B + topOvhg- framex, 5, -sashx/2, gs_UTrans_h + gs_UTrans_w/2 + additionSimpley - gs_rebate_width * (iSide = 2), 5 endif endif del 2
cutend
next iSide del 1
! ============================================================================= end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! =============================================================================
"CallCasement": ! ============================================================================= ! Casement Macro ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! sashWidth: Width of Sash ! sashHeight: Height of Sash ! CasementID: Sash ID ! sh_unID: Hotspot ID ! =============================================================================
call "Casement_rectangular" parameters A = sashWidth, B = sashHeight, CasementID = CasementID, lod3D = lod3D, gs_rebate_width = gs_rebate_width, gs_rebate_depth = gs_rebate_depth, gs_sash_thk = gs_sash_thk, gs_sash_width = gs_sash_width, gs_frame_thk = frame_thk, iMullionStyle_01 = iMullionStyle_01, iMullionStyle_02 = iMullionStyle_02, iMullionStyle_05 = iMullionStyle_05, iMullionStyle_09 = iMullionStyle_09, iMullionPosition = iMullionPosition, ! for iTabs = 1 to vardim1(uiUsedPageIDs) !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Independent pages !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_Shape then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_Shape then gosub "pageCallShape" endif endif !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Window Settings and Opening group !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_WinSettOpening then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_WinSettOpening then bShowAngleValues = 0 bSashOptionsPage = 0 bOpeningTypePage = 1 bFrameSettingsPage = 0
gosub "pageCallWinSettOpening" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_FrameSash then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_FrameSash then gosub "pageCallHistoricFrame" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_SashFrame then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_SashFrame then gosub "pageCallHistoricSash" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_SashOption then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_SashOption then bSashOptionsPage = 1 bOpeningTypePage = 0 bFrameSettingsPage = 0 gosub "pageCallCasementRect" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_VentProfile then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_VentProfile then gosub "pageCallVentilationProfile" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_OpeningType then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_OpeningType then bSashOptionsPage = 0 bOpeningTypePage = 1 bFrameSettingsPage = 0 gosub "pageCallOpeningPic" gosub "pageCallCasementRect" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_WinSettOpModAttr then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_WinSettOpModAttr then listFieldWinOpSettAttrID = iUiID_WinSettOpModAttr gosub "pageCallWinModAttributes" endif endif !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Additional independent pages !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_FloorPlanSection then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_FloorPlanSection then gosub "pageCallFloorPlanAndSect" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1]= iUiID_Descriptions then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageNames[iTabs][2] if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_Descriptions then gosub "pageCallListing" endif endif next iTabs

parameters stored_material[1][i] = stored_material[1][i], stored_material[2][i] = stored_material[2][i]
if stored_material[2][i] = 1 then _lastModSurfaceParameter = stored_material[1][i] endif next i else gosub "preloadSurfaces" endif

PanelGlassArea = PanelGlassArea - SummaGrillArea endif

parameters gs_list_glassarea = gs_list_glassarea lock "gs_list_glassarea" else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_list_glassarea" then gs_list_glassarea_tmp = gs_list_glassarea parameters gs_list_glassarea_tmp = gs_list_glassarea_tmp else gs_list_glassarea = gs_list_glassarea_tmp parameters gs_list_glassarea = gs_list_glassarea endif endif
end
"preloadSurfaces": parameters stored_material[1][1] = gs_frame_mat, stored_material[1][2] = gs_frame_mat2, stored_material[1][3] = gs_sash_mat, stored_material[1][4] = gs_sash_mat2, stored_material[1][5] = gs_grill_mat, stored_material[1][6] = gs_grill_mat2, stored_material[1][7] = gs_panel_mat, stored_material[1][8] = gs_panel_mat2 return
